topics.body:
So Episode 4 starts off with a flashback of all things.

Apparently, [spoiler]Atsushi and Kinshiro used to be friends a long time ago.[/spoiler]
That's...strangely interesting...

Also, love the wish Kinshiro makes when he sees a shooting star.
*_"I wish for world domination."_*
